channel.title: Metagenomics on Ravin Poudel
channel.description: Recent content in Metagenomics on Ravin Poudel

item.title: Metagenomics tutorial
item.description: Welcome to metagenomics tutorial !!! These tutorials walk you through the process of analyzing shotgun metagenomics data. We will cover: Assembly Based Metagenomics Read Based Metagenomics Assembly Based Metagenomics Assembling reads into contigs and mapping reads to the assembled contigs are the primary steps in assembly-based metagenomics. This tutorial walks you through the various steps involved in the process of genome assembly and mapping. Step 1: Quality Check Prior to genome assembly, reads are cleaned using a custom ARS-RQC pipeline, which utilizes a suite of functions from BBtools to remove host genome contamination and trim the standard Illumina barcodes.
